name: Botanic Boogaloo
description:
take control of bogolo in this top-down farming game and plant seeds to grow berries, with the help of the watering robot.
place AI nodes to tell the robot where to go, otherwise it will do its own thing.

The graphical style is inspired by early 2000's gamecube/ps2/xbox games.
i was perhaps a little too ambitious on this one as i didnt really deliver a finished product here but it was fun to make non the less!

i've made this together with my freind Jelst, who has done the general concept whilst i made the game itself for the most part.
